name: A Detective Story
description:
"A Detective Story" is a pixel art styled mystery game that tests your detective skills and instincts.

You are Jackie, a detective on a cruise, but your vacation ends early when one of the guests dies in a mysterious way. You need to find the murderer by solving puzzles, persuading characters and exploring the ship to uncover clues.

Keep your eyes open, everyone's a suspect until proven innocent.

It's an academic project RPG Maker game that can evolve to a full game in the future. This content is for research and feedback.
